title: 7 7 "The Girl with the Sawfish Tattoo" Josef Kubota Wladyka Tiffany Greshler & Ian Stokes and Allison Weintraub & Lindsay Gelfand August 31, 2023(2023-08-31)
transformers_text: 7 7 The Girl with the Sawfish Tattoo Josef Kubota W lady ka Tiffany Gres hler Ian Stokes and Allison Weintraub Lindsay Gelfand August 31 2023 2023 08 31 Under Buggy's direction the Straw Hats arrive at Cono mi Island where Nami's hometown Coco Village is under Ar long's rule They meet No ji ko her adoptive older sister who reveals that as children Ar long killed their adoptive mother Bell m re Gar p questions Zef f about Luffy's whereabouts revealing that he does not want his grandson to end up executed like Roger Nami reveals to No ji ko that she has been working for Ar long since Bell m re's death to buy Coco village's freedom by paying him 100 million berry When Nami in forms Ar long that she finally has the money he betrays her by bribing Marine Captain Nez umi to hide his crimes and confiscate Nami's money With her efforts having gone in vain Nami has a breakdown stabbing her arm to remove Ar long's tattoo When she is stopped by Luffy she begs for his help As the Straw Hats rally together Ar long attacks Coco Village
tf_idf_text: girl sawfish tattoo josef kubota lady tiffany gres hler ian stokes allison weintraub lindsay gelfand august buggy direction straw hat arrive cono island namis hometown coco village longs rule meet adoptive old sister reveals child long kill adoptive mother bell gar question zef luffys whereabouts reveal not want grandson end execute like roger nami reveals work long since bell re death buy coco village freedom pay million berry nami form long finally money betrays bribe marine captain nez umi hide crime confiscate namis money effort go vain nami breakdown stab arm remove longs tattoo stop luffy begs help straw hat rally together long attack coco village
